Story...
caption:
Story Time Chapter 13 is live!
Check it out at: https://archiveofourown.org/works/17511734/chapters/45623761

Story:  Story Time - A Reader x BNHA Multific
Fandom:  僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
Pairing: Bakugou Katsuki/Reader, Kaminari Denki/Reader, Kirishima Eijirou/Reader, Todoroki Shouto/Reader
Additional Tags: Smut, Connected Stories, Alternate Universe - Fairy Tale, Begins in Canon Universe, Kinks, So Many Kinks, Romance, Mild Gore, Light BDSM, Consent, Praise Kink

Word Count: 57,287   Chapters: 13/?   Kudos: 859   Hits: 15,804

Whilst fighting a powerful villain, you find yourself sucked into the world their quirk created with no memories of your old life. Yet, the men you meet along the way have a familiar feel to them. Perhaps they can help you unlock your memories?A Hero Academia/Fairy Tale mash up, there’s plenty of chaos to follow even if you think you know the classic stories well.
[Warning: Explicit Content from chapter 3 onwards][I will warn you which chapter features the non-con]]Story one: Little Red Riding Hood (Katsuki Bakugou x Reader)
Story two: The Little Mermaid (Shouto Todoroki x Reader)
Story three: Jack and the Beanstalk (Eijirou Kirishima x Reader)
Story four: The Three Little Pigs (Denki Kaminari x Reader)

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Interdimensional Love
description:
by ChemicalX

After an experiment gone wrong, Izuku is left questioning his sanity. His job is on the line, his friends won’t stop calling, and, to top it all off, a mysterious stranger has popped up in his basement. Why won’t this psycho stop sniffing him!?

Izuku is about to learn that True Mates transcend time and space; nothing can stop the destiny of true love.

(Rating subject to change).

Words: 3903, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya, Todoroki Enji | Endeavor
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Scientist!Izuku, Mental Breakdown, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Alpha Bakugou Katsuki, Izuku doesn’t have a secondary gender, Barbarian Bakugou Katsuki

title: BNHA Creator Discord
body:
So I built (and am looking for members for) a BNHA writers/creators discord for sharing and discussing fic ideas (short or long), prompts, challenges, AUs, and OCs, etc.

All content creators are welcome!

https://discord.gg/e2yNEHR

summary: Hello 👋 Just wondering what your morning routine is?
question: Hello 👋 Just wondering what your morning routine is?
answer:
“Oh, hello to you too anon”

“Hmm, my morning routine is quite simple to say the least, as I simply get up at 4 AM in the morning in order to get ready and fetch some breakfast, which is usually a cup of hot chocolate with mini marshmallows, peppermint sprinkles, whipped cream, cinnamon, and cookie crumbs, along with mayhaps some cinnamon rolls, or caramelized, chocolate filled croissants. Afterward, I normally go to check up on my boss and make sure he’s awake, I tend to iron his clothes in the morning and fold them at the corner of his bed ready for him to use once he gets out of his bath which I also prepare and make sure has the essential oils and salt in order to take care of master Overhaul’s delicate skin, in order for him to get a thorough and successful cleansing of such perfect feature, once that’s done it is just a matter of time until he mentally prepares himself to go to work and we’re off, I cannot tell you more than just that, as the boss would quite literally blow my head off.”

blog.description:
Welcome to the Femslash Big Bang! Please follow the links below for more information. Make sure to keep track of posts tagged with #updates!

MOBILE LINKS
ABOUT | FAQ | SCHEDULE | DISCORD

body:
Sign-Up Apps

We’re very excited to announce that sign-ups for this event are open! You can access the form following this link here!

We want to remind everyone that you don’t need prior experience to join! Everyone is accepted after applying, and we won’t be asking you to submit other any other works on the form.

Our discord server is also open for joining, which is linked on this page and at the end of the application form.

We do hope to see your applications, and be sure to send in an ask if you’re confused about anything!
